alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 12:13PM CST until February 28 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Amory For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Bigbee, Amory, Aberdeen L & D...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River near Amory. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Lowland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
